definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: disturbance, trouble, only in ´[[עֵמֶק ע]] valley of trouble, W. or SW. from Jericho Jos 7:24, Jos 7:26 (JE; name explained), on border of Judah Jos 15:7 (P), cf. Ho 2:17, Is 65:10; on identif. cf. esp. Di:Jos 7:24 Buhl:Geogr. 98; Emekaxwr, fa/ragc (or koi/lav) Axwr.
